_comment: English translations for React.js Complete Course (ReactCourseSeeder)

template.title: React.js完全コース
template.description: JavaScript経験者向けReact.jsコース。12週間でコンポーネント、Hooks、状態管理、ルーティングから実践的なアプリ開発まで学習します。

React.js完全コース.title: React.js Complete Course
React.js完全コース.description: React.js course for JavaScript developers. Learn from components, Hooks, state management, and routing to practical app development over 12 weeks.

React基礎.title: React Fundamentals
React基礎.description: React environment setup, JSX, components, Props, State, event handling

Hooks.title: Hooks
Hooks.description: useState, useEffect, useContext, useReducer, custom hooks

State Management & Routing.title: State Management & Routing
State Management & Routing.description: React Router, Redux Toolkit, asynchronous processing, middleware
deliverables: Manage global state with Redux Toolkit

第1週：Reactとは？環境構築とJSX.title: Week 1: What is React? Environment Setup and JSX
第1週：Reactとは？環境構築とJSX.description: React overview, Create React App, JSX, component basics

Reactとは？.title: What is React?
Reactとは？.content: Component-based UI library. Virtual DOM, declarative, one-way data flow. By Meta.

React環境構築.title: React Environment Setup
React環境構築.content: npx create-react-app, Vite + react template. Folder: src/, public/, package.json.

JSXの基本.title: JSX Basics
JSXの基本.content: Single parent or <>. className, style={{}}. Self-closing /. {} for JS. {/* comment */}.

第2週：コンポーネント、Props、State.title: Week 2: Components, Props, State
第2週：コンポーネント、Props、State.description: Component creation, data passing with Props, state management with State

コンポーネントの種類.title: Component Types
コンポーネントの種類.content: Function components (recommended), arrow. Props, export/import. Prefer function over class.

Props（プロパティ）.title: Props
Props（プロパティ）.content: Parent-to-child data. Destructure { name }. Defaults, children. Pass objects/arrays.

State（useState）.title: State (useState)
State（useState）.content: [value, setValue] = useState(init). setValue to update. Object/array: spread then set.

第3週：イベント処理、リスト、フォーム.title: Week 3: Event Handling, Lists, Forms
第3週：イベント処理、リスト、フォーム.description: Event handling, list rendering, form control

イベント処理.title: Event Handling
イベント処理.content: onClick={handler}, (e) =>. e.target, e.preventDefault(). onChange, onSubmit, onFocus, etc.

リストレンダリングとkey.title: List Rendering and Keys
リストレンダリングとkey.content: map() to list. key unique, prefer id not index. Key on top-level in map.

制御されたコンポーネント.title: Controlled Components
制御されたコンポーネント.content: value + onChange from state. Single handleChange with name. checkbox: checked. Validate on submit.

第4週：useState、useEffect.title: Week 4: useState, useEffect
第4週：useState、useEffect.description: State management basics, side effect handling, lifecycle

useEffectの基本.title: useEffect Basics
useEffectの基本.content: useEffect(fn), fn runs after render. [] = mount only. [dep] = when dep changes. Return cleanup.

useEffectの依存配列.title: useEffect Dependency Array
useEffectの依存配列.content: No deps: every render. []: mount once. [a,b]: when a or b changes. Avoid object/array in deps; use primitives.

第5週：useContext、useReducer.title: Week 5: useContext, useReducer
第5週：useContext、useReducer.description: State sharing with Context API, complex state management with useReducer

useContext.title: useContext
useContext.content: createContext, Provider value={}. useContext(MyContext). Wrap with custom hook for safety.

useReducer.title: useReducer
useReducer.content: (state, action) => newState. dispatch({ type, payload }). Use for complex or local redux-like state.

第6週：その他のHooksとカスタムフック.title: Week 6: Other Hooks and Custom Hooks
第6週：その他のHooksとカスタムフック.description: useRef, useMemo, useCallback, custom hook creation

useRef、useMemo、useCallback.title: useRef, useMemo, useCallback
useRef、useMemo、useCallback.content: useRef: DOM ref or mutable value. useMemo: memoize value. useCallback: memoize function. Deps array.

カスタムフック.title: Custom Hooks
カスタムフック.content: useX() that uses other hooks. useLocalStorage, useFetch, useToggle, useDebounce. Reuse logic.

第7週：React Router.title: Week 7: React Router
第7週：React Router.description: Routing, navigation, dynamic routes, nested routes

React Router v6.title: React Router v6
React Router v6.content: BrowserRouter, Routes, Route, Link. useParams(), useNavigate(), useSearchParams(). Outlet for nested. Protected routes.

Redux Toolkitの概要.title: Redux Toolkit Overview
Redux Toolkitの概要.content: configureStore, createSlice. Less boilerplate. DevTools, default middleware.

SliceとStore.title: Slice and Store
SliceとStore.content: createSlice({ name, initialState, reducers }). export actions & reducer. Provider with store.

createAsyncThunk.title: createAsyncThunk
createAsyncThunk.content: Async thunk for fetch. pending/fulfilled/rejected in extraReducers. dispatch(thunk()).

RTK Query.title: RTK Query
RTK Query.content: createApi, baseQuery. define endpoints. useGetXQuery, useMutation. Caching, refetch.

第10週：パフォーマンス最適化.title: Week 10: Performance Optimization
第10週：パフォーマンス最適化.description: React.memo, Code Splitting, Lazy Loading, optimization techniques

React.memoとメモ化.title: React.memo and Memoization
React.memoとメモ化.content: React.memo(Comp) for props equality. useMemo/useCallback to avoid unnecessary rerenders.

Code SplittingとLazy.title: Code Splitting and Lazy
Code SplittingとLazy.content: React.lazy(() => import()). Suspense fallback. Route-based or component-based split.

第11週：テスト.title: Week 11: Testing
第11週：テスト.description: Jest, React Testing Library, component testing

Jestの基本.title: Jest Basics
Jestの基本.content: describe, it, expect(). toBe, toHaveBeenCalled. Mock with jest.fn().

React Testing Library.title: React Testing Library
React Testing Library.content: render(), screen, userEvent. getByRole, getByText. Test behavior, not implementation. waitFor.

第12週：TypeScript + React、デプロイ.title: Week 12: TypeScript + React, Deployment
第12週：TypeScript + React、デプロイ.description: TypeScript and React integration, best practices, deployment

TypeScriptとReact.title: TypeScript and React
TypeScriptとReact.content: FC, Props types, useState<T>, useRef<T>. Generic components. Strict mode.

デプロイ.title: Deployment
デプロイ.content: npm run build. Static hosting: Vercel, Netlify. Env vars, routing for SPA.
